Degree distribution comparison with random network

Source: R/5.topological.R
rand_net.Rd

Degree distribution comparison with random network

rand_net(go = go, plot = TRUE)

Arguments

go

igraph object

plot

plot or not

Value

ggplot

See also

Other topological: extract_sample_net(), fit_power(), get_group_skeleton(), links_stat(), nc(), net_par(), rand_net_par(), smallworldness()

Examples

rand_net(co_net)

#> IGRAPH 176f60c U--- 451 740 -- Erdos-Renyi (gnm) graph
#> + attr: name (g/c), type (g/c), loops (g/l), m (g/n)
#> + edges from 176f60c:
#>  [1]   6--  7  15-- 18  10-- 28   4-- 33  19-- 41  20-- 43  33-- 43  42-- 43
#>  [9]   6-- 45  22-- 51  43-- 54   9-- 55  34-- 59  39-- 61  28-- 62  25-- 70
#> [17]  35-- 71  36-- 74  58-- 75  40-- 77  23-- 78  51-- 78   8-- 81  40-- 82
#> [25]  52-- 86  14-- 87  75-- 88  62-- 92  69-- 92  19-- 93  57-- 93  86-- 93
#> [33]   5-- 94  32-- 95  22-- 96  42-- 96  58-- 97  28-- 98  55--100  50--102
#> [41]  53--102   1--103  78--104  24--106  67--106  74--106  39--108   1--109
#> [49]  20--112  73--113  11--114 113--114   7--116  58--116  26--117  55--117
#> [57]  86--118  90--119   2--120  43--122 102--122  64--127 107--128  13--129
